desc: 100% boost to Atk, Def, probable slight damage reduction, boosts OD gauge fill rate, 70% boost to Spark damage, boosts critical hit damage, boosts BB Atk & lowers max HP by 40%

dictionary.lore: As corruption and hedonism rose within the kingdom, Malachus's followers hardened hearts and sowed indecision throughout the land. Tempers grew short and arguments flared for the simplest of reasons, adding fuel to the fire of revolution already overflowing at the seams. Meanwhile, thousands of innocents were falsely condemned by her cultists as demon-worshippers, further weakening the morale of the people. Her view of her rivals was thus: "For all his plans, Maestron has proven to be utterly predictable in his schemes. As for his pawns, they are too easily bought off with a breathy promise - weak worms."

name: Malicious Torment
